<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/install`**

**quick ref:**
> /install [url]

**description:**

```
install a texture package from url
/install http://cc.paraengine.com/twiki/pub/CCWeb/Installer/blocktexture_FangKuaiGaiNian_16Bits.zip
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
从目录中安装一个材质压缩包。
